document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Epstein 
Date: Tue, 11 Dec 2007 22:20:55 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Attachments: 071211 tr_to_Lefkowitz.pdf 
I  am out today, but I  will start pulling everything together tomorrow. We don't have transcripts of all of the state 
interviews, but we have audio or videotapes of all of them. 
I  drafted the attached letter, which I  would like to send to Jay. 
Fra 
Se • • M 
To: 
Cc: 
Subje :Epstein 
In light of the recent Kirkland & Ellis correspondence asked o conduct a de novo review of the evidence 
underlying the proposed indictment. I've provided =with the proposed indictment package but can you make copies of 
the 302s , state al and interview transcripts, and any other underlying investigative information thatEcan review 
a.s.a.p.? Thanks, 
EFTA00013537
